text: Subject: Problems with software installation
Hello IT department,
I'm having trouble installing the accounting software on my laptop.
The installation starts, but after about 50% there is always an error.
The error message is: 'Error 404: File not found'.
I urgently need the software for the upcoming financial audit next week.
Could you please help me fix this problem?
Thank you in advance,
Julia Schmidt

ticket.title: Software installation problem

text: Subject: Printer not working

Please help us quickly.

Tobias Klein
